text: Lorenzo Insigne (born 4 June 1991) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Major League Soccer club Toronto FC. . He is known mainly for his creativity, short height, speed and his accuracy from free- kicks. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Naples Category:Footballers from Campania Category:Toronto FC players Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players
title: Lorenzo Insigne
